name: Dragon Defense
overview: King Arthur is dead and the wicked Prince Mordred now rules Camelot. Guenevere, the exiled queen, has asked Merlin for the power to destroy Mordred and return the kingdom to glory. Will Merlin reach Guenevere before Mordred's dragons destroy him? The outcome depends on you! • Battle Fire Breathing Dragons! • Help Merlin find Guenevere. 9 Levels of play.
